name: HELLBOI (fantamagico)
description:
HELLBOI

He's a good boi in hell

STORY

hellboi went to hell

what will happen next?

GAMEPLAY

try to go in the end of hell

something incredible awaits you

CONTROLS

left tap to jump 1 step

right tap to jump 2 steps

DOWNLOAD

The game is free on iOS and Android, with no ads or in-app purchases

For now you can download the Android APK

Store links coming soon!

 If you enjoy the game, come to the FANTAMAGICO Discord server to say HI!
